curam.core.impl
Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
  curam.core.base.SearchController
      curam.core.impl.SearchController
All Implemented Interfaces:
curam.core.intf.SearchController
public class SearchController
extends curam.core.base.SearchController

Controls a register of all search services and provides information on each. Users of this class can find out what services are registered and all relevant Entities. This is necessary for extraction operation for the population of the staging DB. Information about services affected by an Entity updates creations or deletions is also available. This is needed to update the Staging DB during Synchronization. Search implementation requested are channeled through the registrar for validation.
